name: Three Sheep HD Free
description:
The three sheep are daddy, mom and baby sheep. They are a happy family.

The objective of the game is to get the three sheep back to home. It is not an easy trip. Cliff, cages, closed gates, heavy stones and many other obstacles are on their way. The sheep family have to work as a team to overcome these difficulties. The adventure is tough. It requires everyone's effort and skill to complete missions.

Daddy sheep: fat, strong.
Skill: strengh to move heavy objects.

Mom sheep: slim.
Skill: good at jumping.

Baby sheep: small.
Skill: reaching narrow space.

It is a fun puzzle game. The levels are challenging and addictive. More levels will be added in the future updates.

If you do enjoy the game, please buy the full version for more levels.
